description:
Role: Machine Learning Engineer

Location: Atlanta, GA (On-site/hybrid)

Duration: 12+ Months

Job description:

Comprehensive understanding of Machine Learning models and algorithms is necessary.

The ability to script in Python for data analysis, and experience with Python libraries such as HuggingFace, Langchain, scikit-learn and Keras is expected.
